entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
